cgcloud__Route_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Route_Template__c
cgcloud__Route_Template__c.description: Stores the details of the route template object that's to be used for routes.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Indicates whether the template is active. Only active templates are available to create routes.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description of the route template in the languages that are configured for the sales organization.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales organization in which the template can be used.

cgcloud__Tour_Template__c.description: Reference to the tour template object.
